SELECT R.REQ_NO, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REQUEST_TIME, R.STATUS, R.PAY_STATUS, R.PAY_AMOUNT, R.CONTENT, R.INSERT_TIME, R.MASTER_NO, MM.NAME AS MASTER_NAME, MM.PROFILE_PHOTO AS MASTER_PROFILE_PHOTO, MM.ADDRESS AS MASTER_ADDRESS, R.CLIENT_NO, MC.NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, MC.PROFILE_PHOTO AS CLIENT_PROFILE_PHOTO, R.ADDRESS AS CLIENT_ADDRESS, R.ADDRESS_DETAIL AS CLIENT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, C.CA_NO, C.CA_NAME, CR.CA_NO AS CA_ROOT_NO, CR.CA_NAME AS CA_ROOT_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REQ_NO = R.REQ_NO) AS reviewCnt, RE.CONTENT AS REVIEW_CONTENT, RE.STAR_SCORE, (CURRENT_DATE - to_date(substring(R.REQUEST_DATE, 1, 11), 'YYYY. MM. DD')) AS DAYSDIFF FROM REQUEST R JOIN MEMBER MC ON R.CLIENT_NO = MC.ME_NO JOIN MEMBER MM ON R.MASTER_NO = MM.ME_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.CA_NO = MM.CA_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY CR ON CR.CA_NO = C.ROOT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW RE ON RE.REQ_NO = R.REQ_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND MC.ME_NO = CAST(#{clientNo} AS INTEGER)NULL
AND MM.ME_NO = CAST(#{masterNo} AS INTEGER)NULL
AND R.STATUS = #{status}
ORDER BY R.REQUEST_DATE ${sortOrder}, R.REQUEST_TIME ${sortOrder} NULLS LAST
ORDER BY ${sortField} ${sortOrder} NULLS LAST
LIMIT (#{endRow} - #{startRow} + 1) OFFSET (#{startRow} - 1)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQUEST R JOIN MEMBER MC ON R.CLIENT_NO = MC.ME_NO JOIN MEMBER MM ON R.MASTER_NO = MM.ME_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND MC.ME_NO = CAST(#{clientNo} AS INTEGER)NULL
AND MM.ME_NO = CAST(#{masterNo} AS INTEGER)NULL
AND R.STATUS = #{status}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQUEST R JOIN MEMBER MC ON R.CLIENT_NO = MC.ME_NO JOIN MEMBER MM ON R.MASTER_NO = MM.ME_NO WHERE MM.ME_NO = CAST(#{meNo} AS INTEGER)NULL AND R.STATUS = 'requested'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS allCnt, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE R.STATUS = 'requested') AS requestedCnt, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE R.STATUS = 'approved') AS approvedCnt, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE R.STATUS = 'paywait') AS paywaitCnt, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE R.STATUS = 'paid') AS paidCnt, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE R.STATUS = 'cancel') AS cancelCnt FROM REQUEST R WHERE 1 = 1
AND CLIENT_NO = CAST(#{clientNo} AS INTEGER)NULL
AND MASTER_NO = CAST(#{masterNo} AS INTEGER)NULL

AND R.REQ_NO = CAST(#{reqNo} AS INTEGER)NULL
